actions.text: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 263 (Roll no. 592).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to increase the freight program small project set aside from 10 percent to 20 percent.
purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to increase the freight program small project set aside from 10 percent to 20 percent.
